meanings.definition: The state or condition of being excessively saturated.
meanings.sent1: The oversaturations of colors in the painting made it hard to focus on any one detail.
meanings.sent2: The oversaturations of flavors in the dish overwhelmed my taste buds.
meanings.sent3: The oversaturations of emojis in her text messages always made me smile.
meanings.sent4: The oversaturations of information in the report left me feeling lost in a sea of data.
meanings.sent5: The oversaturations of noise at the concert made it impossible to hear the music clearly.

meanings.definition: The act or process of saturating to an excessive degree.
meanings.sent1: The oversaturations of advertisements on the website annoyed the users.
meanings.sent2: The oversaturations of paint on the canvas created a thick, textured surface.
meanings.sent3: The oversaturations of toppings on the pizza made it almost impossible to pick up a slice.
meanings.sent4: The oversaturations of perfume in the room made it hard to breathe.
meanings.sent5: The oversaturations of traffic on the highway caused a major delay in our journey.
